about_the_game:
Follow and Wishlist our collection of weird fiction and cosmic horror stories:

!!! All profits will be donated to help the victims of war in Ukraine !!!

^ click for more information

Here’s a little treat for all the true cultists out there: a DLC with several Dagon-related extras.

This DLC does not contain a new story

The Eldritch Box DLC contains:

  • ebook version of “Dagon” by H. P. Lovecraft in several formats (mobi, epub, pdf) and languages (every language available in the game), including stylised screenshots

  • ebook version of “Fishhead” by Irvin S. Cobb (a story about a strange fishlike human, one of the inspirations behind “Dagon”, in English)

  • audiobook version of “Dagon” (narrator only)

  • audiobook version of “Dagon” (including additional sounds from the game)

  • official wallpapers

To access the files:

  • Right-click Dagon in your Steam library

  • Select Manage >

  • Click Browse Local Files

By buying this DLC you are helping us fund our future narrative projects, so thank you for your support!

short_description: Here’s a little treat for all the true cultists out there: a DLC with several Dagon-related extras. By buying it you support our future projects.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Arabic, Czech, Korean, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
